name: Outwith
description:
Early prototype consisting of a small zone containing a handful of enemies to fight.

The purpose of this demo is to gather feedback around the left hand/right hand spell mechanics and whether this would be viable with further development.

There are currently some basic spells of which fire will inflict DOT and an ice-based spell that will slow enemies. There's also a few different enemy types with slightly different ai behaviour.

Also the spell effects are mainly placeholders.

Thanks in advance for any feedback.
